fields.description:
h2. Problem description
When putting an ImageView inside a ScrollView, the image is not centered in the ScrollView. When the view is zoomed in/out, the image gets centered.

h2. Steps to reproduce
- Create an app with the code here: http://pastebin.com/ijZGCzPH
- Run the app: the image will be as large as the screen, on top
- Zoom in and zoom out: the image gets centered

h2. Expected behavior
The image is always centered
fields.summary: iOS: ImageView not centered inside a ScrollView until you zoom in/out
